content.text:
Hey [@Chris Cassano](@ELCcyJwKF1WlnIhgqbBZqLvyJgv92LPx1tt8R7qXaWQ=.ed25519)!

Currently your best way to do that would be to use private messages. Others will be able to see that you're posting *something*, but won't be able to see what (or who they're to). Posts are replicated via gossip, so others will replicate and share your posts with everyone.
